sqlMap.sql: SELECT ID, COMPANY_ID, CARD_NAME, CARD_IMAGE_SRC FROM SERVICE_APPLY_LOG WHERE ( 1 = 1 ) <#if id?exists && id!=""> And ID=:id </#if> <#if companyId?exists && companyId!=""> And COMPANY_ID=:companyId </#if> <#if cardName?exists && cardName!=""> And CARD_NAME=:cardName </#if> <#if cardImageSrc?exists && cardImageSrc!=""> And CARD_IMAGE_SRC=:cardImageSrc </#if> <#if oderbyField?exists && oderbyField!=""> Order by ${oderbyField} </#if> <#if oderbyAscOrDesc?exists && oderbyAscOrDesc!=""> ${oderbyAscOrDesc} </#if>
INSERT INTO SERVICE_APPLY_LOG (APPLY_ID, STATUS, APPROVAL_ID, APPROVAL_NAME, APPROVAL_DATE, APPROVAL_REMARK) VALUES ( :applyId, :status, :approvalId, :approvalName, :approvalDate, :approvalRemark)
UPDATE SERVICE_APPLY_LOG SET COMPANY_ID = :companyId, CARD_NAME = :cardName, CARD_IMAGE_SRC = :cardImageSrc WHERE ID = # {id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
